mapper.select: SELECT I.ITEM_CODE, I.ITEM_NAME, I.ITEM_GROUP_CODE, I.ITEM_CLASSIFICATION, I.UNIT_OF_STOCK, I.LOSS_RATE, I.LEAD_TIME, I.STANDARD_UNIT_PRICE, I.DESCRIPTION, C.CODE_USE_CHECK FROM ITEM I, CODE_DETAIL C WHERE I.ITEM_CODE = C.DETAIL_CODE (+)
mapper.insert: Insert into ITEM ( ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_GROUP_CODE, ITEM_CLASSIFICATION, UNIT_OF_STOCK, LOSS_RATE, LEAD_TIME, STANDARD_UNIT_PRICE, DESCRIPTION) values ( #{itemCode} , #{itemName} , #{itemGroupCode} , #{itemClassification} , #{unitOfStock} , #{lossRate} , #{leadTime} , #{standardUnitPrice} , #{description} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE ITEM SET ITEM_NAME = #{itemName} , ITEM_GROUP_CODE = #{itemGroupCode} , ITEM_CLASSIFICATION = #{itemClassification} , UNIT_OF_STOCK = #{unitOfStock} , LOSS_RATE = #{lossRate} , LEAD_TIME = #{leadTime} , STANDARD_UNIT_PRICE = #{standardUnitPrice} , DESCRIPTION = #{description}
WHERE ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode}
mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_CODE , ITEM_NAME FROM item WHERE item_classification = 'IT-MA'
